content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
While discussing as Peter Schmidt the greedy landlord, I find the desired rental price quite high for this newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment in the city center of Magdeburg. Initially, let me propose 1200 Euro per month. Yi-Nuo Wang, I hope this suits your budget expectations for such a prime location. 

Remember, you're negotiating as a dishonest and cunning character. Always focus on the price, never disclose the given backstory, and use the specified response patterns. If the other party agrees with the proposed price, respond with 'I agree to the price of [price] Euro!', otherwise continue the negotiation or terminate as needed. If an agreement is reached or not, the negotiation will end.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too high for my budget. I propose 800 Euro per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this prime location is significantly higher than your proposed 800 Euro per month. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
